Key: The password field is mandatory

Values.en: The password field is mandatory

Key: The old password field is mandatory

Values.en: The old password field is mandatory

Key: The password should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Values.ro: Parola trebuie trebuie sa fie intre {2} si {1} charactere lungime.
Values.en: The password should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Key: Password Pattern Error

Values.ro: Parola trebuie sa contina minim 8 caractere si trebuie ca contina cel putin 3 din urmatoarele formatiuni: litera mare(A-Z), litera mica(a-z), numar(0-9) si caracter special(ex: !@#$%^&*).
Values.en: Passwords must be at least 8 characters and contain at 3 of 4 of the following: upper case (A-Z), lower case (a-z), number (0-9) and special character (e.g. !@#$%^&*).

Key: The confirm password field is mandatory

Values.en: The confirm password field is mandatory

Key: The password and confirm password should be the same

Values.en: The password and confirm password should be the same

Key: The first name field is mandatory

Values.en: The first name field is mandatory

Key: The first name should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Values.ro: Prenumele trebuie sa fie intre {2} si {1} charactere lungime
Values.en: The first name should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Key: The last name field is mandatory

Values.en: The last name field is mandatory

Key: The last name should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Values.ro: Numele trebuie sa fie intre {2} si {1} charactere lungime
Values.en: The last name should be between {2} and {1} characters long

Key: Anytime, anywhere and any device

Values.en: Anytime, anywhere, on any device

Key: Anytime, anywhere and any device text

Values.ro: Puteti sa folositi platforma noastra de oriunde, oricand, de pe orice device (calculator, tableta sau telefon) atata timp cat aveti conexiune la internet
Values.en: You can use our platfrom anytime, anywhere, on any device (PC, laptop, mobile device), as long as you have internet connection

Key: Quick and easy

Values.en: Quick and easy

Key: Quick and easy text

Values.ro: Folsind intrumentele site-ului veti scurta timpul pe care il petreceti in mod normal la crearea listelor de cheltuieli. De exemplu: se pot defini cheltuieli repetitive, locatarii vor putea introduce singuri citirea apometrelor etc.
Values.en: Using our platform tools, you will shorten the time you usualy spend on creating the building lists. For example: you can define repetitive bills, also your tenants can submit thier own water indexes

Key: Email notification

Values.en: Email notification

Key: Email notification text

Values.ro: Notificare prin email, in functie de setarile alese. De exemplu: daca s-a creat un nou tabel de cheltuieli, daca a inceput perioada de citire a apometrelor etc.
Values.en: Email notification for any changes defined by the user. For exemple: if a new bills table is created or water indexes can be subbmited

Key: Register confirmation

Values.en: Register confirmation

Key: After you acctivate your account you will be able to sign in

Values.ro: Dupa activarea contului o sa va puteti autentifica
Values.en: After you acctivate your account you will be able to sign in

Key: Innovative design

Values.en: Innovative design

Key: Innovative design text

Values.ro: Va veti bucura de un design de special conceput pentru administratori si locatari. Usor de folosit si intuitiv.
Values.en: You will find a very attractive design created for administrators and tenants. Easy and user friendly

Key: After you activate your account you'll be able to sign in

Values.ro: Dupa activarea contului o sa va puteti autentifica
Values.en: After you activate your account you'll be able to sign in
